pullRequest.title: CLDR-13649 Fix two unit preferences bugs.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Update Swedish road preferences.
Add "inch" preferences for CA/GB/IN/US person-height below 3 ft.

Checklist

 Issue filed: https://unicode-org.atlassian.net/browse/CLDR-13649
 Updated PR title and link in previous line to include Issue number

nodes.bodyText:
This needs to be instead, the following 2 lines:
<unitPreference regions="CA GB IN US" geq="3.0">foot-and-inch</unitPreference>
<unitPreference regions="CA GB IN US">inch</unitPreference>
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -314,7 +314,7 @@ For terms of use, see http://www.unicode.org/copyright.html
         </unitPreferences>
         <unitPreferences category="length" usage="person-height">
             <unitPreference regions="001">centimeter</unitPreference>
-            <unitPreference regions="CA GB IN US" geq="3.0">foot-and-inch</unitPreference>
+            <unitPreference regions="CA GB IN US">foot-and-inch</unitPreference>

beforeCommit.message: Update Swedish road preferences as per CLDR-13649.

afterCommit.message:
Update Swedish road preferences as per CLDR-13649.

Add "inch" preferences for CA/GB/IN/US person-height below 3 ft.

commit.message:
CLDR-13649 Fix two unit preferences bugs.

- Update Swedish road preferences as per recommendations in CLDR-13649.
- Add "inch" preferences for CA/GB/IN/US person-height below 3 ft.

Update Swedish road preferences as per CLDR-13649.

Add "inch" preferences for CA/GB/IN/US person-height below 3 ft.

afterCommit.message:

- Update Swedish road preferences as per recommendations in CLDR-13649.
- Add "inch" preferences for CA/GB/IN/US person-height below 3 ft.
